rules_text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, gain control of up to one target creature with power less than Muyang Recruiter's power until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.
Relentless [i](When this creature dies, if it doesn't have haste, return it to the battlefield at the beginning of your next upkeep. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of your next end step.)[/i]
